{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Edimax |model=BR-6204Wg / BR-6304Wg / EW-7209APg |revision=v1 |asin= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=EoL |fcc_date=08/16/2005 |fcc_id=NDD9562040507 |pcb_id=1244-00000377-010 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8186 |cpu1_cspeed=180 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160AB |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=PSC |ram1_model=A2V64S40DTP |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8186 |wi1_chip2_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip2_model=RTL8225 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8305SC |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui= |oui_eth= }}
:[http://www.edimax.us/html/english/products/BR-6204Wg.htm '''BR-6204Wg''' • Specs] • [http://www.edimax.co.uk/en/produce_detail.php?pd_id=11&pl1_id=1&pl2_id=2 Product page] (Wireless router) :[http://www.edimax.com/en/produce_detail.php?pd_id=12&pl1_id=3&pl2_id=18 '''BR-6304Wg''' • Product page] (VPN router/IPSec gateway) :[http://www.edimax.us/html/english/products/EW-7209APg.htm '''EW-7209APg''' • Specs] • [http://www.edimax.com/en/produce_detail.php?pd_id=19&pl1_id=1&pl2_id=5 Product page] (AP+Station+Bridge+Repeater)
"1244-00000377-010" is silkscreened on the board.
{{See also|Edimax BR-6204WLg|Edimax}}
*[https://pop.fsck.pl/hardware/edimax-br-6204wg.html ''Edimax BR-6204Wg'' Hardware on '''pop.fsck.pl''']
===Models=== The FCC test report lists the following as identical models.. *Edimax BR-6204Wg *Edimax BR-6304Wg *Edimax EW-7209APg *GLP GR-F04P (6204Wg) *GLP GR-F04PV (6304Wg) *GLP GAP-E09g (7209APg) *Sandberg A/S Denmark 130-99 (6204Wg) *Sitecom WL-527 (6204Wg) *Conceptronic C54BRS4 (6204Wg) *hama 62785 (6204Wg) *CANYON CN-WF514 (6204Wg) *Planet WRT-414 (6204Wg) *Planet WAP-4032 (7209APg) *Longshine LCS-WR5-2114 (6204Wg) *IC Intracom 521666 (6204Wg) *Startech HUBS-BR455GWDC (6204Wg *Mustek BR-6204Wg (6204Wg) *MICROTEK ITALIA SPA MEG323 (6204Wg) *American Satellite RS-100R (6204Wg)
These devices cannot run any mainstream third-party firmware. :See [http://www.linux-mips.org/wiki/Realtek_SOC Realtek_SOC on the Linux-mips wiki].
__NOTOC__
